_header: Old men sayen in words few
Subjects: proverbs; love, vicissitudes of; women, fickleness of
_description: Proverbial sayings on absence — three couplets

BLSl1825.Transcription:
Old men saien in wordis fewThat long absence ys it sherewThat
                    somtyme was lef hit makith lothTrustith absence for noon othy shal you
                    say and wel y canthe tide of loue abidith noman
BLSl1825.Note:
Added to a flyleaf by a fifteenth-century hand. Title or motto to right
                    by same hand: ‘An iour la vie’; precedes 6869 on same leaf.
